body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.37 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Completion of the DIB engine.
Improvements to the C++ runtime.
A number of fixes in the audio drivers.
Unnecessary Direct3D options removed from WineCfg.
Some fixes to the built-in Internet Explorer.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
